column1: #text=My neighborhood is kind of boring looking since there are n't many plants , I guess you could say it looks barren .
#text=One day I decided to do something about this , so I went to the local plant store with the intention of buying a tree .
#text=I decided I wanted the tree to be functional rather than just cosmetic , so I decided to buy a small apple tree .
#text=I brought the tree home and got to work digging a hole in my front yard with a shovel .
#text=It was hard work and the weather was hot , but finally the hole was big enough to plant the tree .
#text=I then carefully took the tree out of its pot and placed it in the hole .
#text=I filled the hole back up with dirt and made sure the tree was steady .
#text=It was a nice sight , some of my neighbors even complimented me .
#text=I now water the tree every day to make sure it grows strong .
